info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2024,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment:
I had a fantastic stay at this Airbnb! The host - Khaled bhai was incredibly welcoming and accommodating, making sure I had everything I needed for a comfortable stay.
The apartment was clean, beautifully decorated, and had all the amenities I could ask for. The location was perfect, with easy access to public transportation and great restaurants nearby.
I highly recommend this Airbnb to anyone looking for a cozy and convenient and close to environment place to stay in Dhaka.
Thank you for a wonderful experience!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2024,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: Faruque is an incredible and kind host. You will not regret staying with him in his lovely home. He helped me through many issues related to my visa and provided me with a great deal of support. Excellent location!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2024,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: Great stay

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: The unit is centrally located just a short walk away from a wide selection of shops and restaurants, but far enough removed from the main street that it was a nice quiet escape from the chaos of Dhaka. It is also located right near the local police station. Faruque was an extremely kind and accommodating host. I unfortunately lost the first couple of days of my trip due to a bit of illness I had contracted in India the previous week, and Faruque was so kind as to give me some medicine to settle my stomach. He was always very quick with communication and ready to answer my questions regardless of the time. He also made check-in extremely smooth by meeting me upon arrival. Surely a top tier host I would be happy to stay with again.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · September 2023,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: Very nice place, it was very clean and well-maintained. The surroundings of the house make it different from other places as it is filled with trees and shrubs. Has a nice and fresh atmosphere. Will definitely be my go-to for the times I come to visit Dhaka again.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · August 2023,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment:
Me and my daughter very much liked the tree surrounded house in the middle of Gulshan. Surprisingly quiet and the air was fresh, possible for the trees. My daughter enjoyed the open terrace.
The hosts were very responsive and helpful also. They made the booking process very easy and clear. Will definitely book this place again in my next future trip to Dhaka.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2023
rating_comment: I'll visit again

info: Rating, 3 stars,  · March 2023,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment:
This is from the perspective of a European guest.
Positive:
-Very good location
-Independent place, no one disturbs, privacy is given
-Rumana was kind and tried to make the stay as comfy as possible, also available on Ramadan
Negative:
This place is not on Western standard, but asks a Western price. Dirty floor, bed terribly hard and loud, small bathroom (I didn't find warm water), kitchen poorly equipped, everything is very old and dirtyish. No supermarket in close range.
What was really unpleasant to me is that I had negotiated with the owner before my stay and he was willing to give me a good discount. However, I changed the dates and he couldn't send the offer anymore, so he said book for a couple of days and the rest is OK or we will see. I asked him how much it would me and he named me a bold price. My answer was that I hope we can find a better price. In the end he asked again the high price, but went down for about half. Local guests I had there all told me I had overpaid.
